35#include <sys/cdefs.h>
36__RCSID("$NetBSD: kiconv.c,v 1.2 2013/12/25 22:03:15 christos Exp $");
37
38#include <sys/param.h>
39#include <sys/types.h>
40#include <sys/sysctl.h>
41#include <ctype.h>
42#include <errno.h>
43#include <netsmb/iconv.h>
44
45#ifdef APPLE
46#include <sys/types.h>
47extern uid_t real_uid, eff_uid;
48#endif
49
50int
51kiconv_add_xlat_table(const char *to, const char *from, const u_char *table)
52{
53#ifdef __NetBSD__
54 /* XXX not supported on NetBSD (yet) */
55 return (0);
56#else
57 struct iconv_add_in din;
58 struct iconv_add_out dout;
59 int olen;
60
61 if (strlen(from) > ICONV_CSNMAXLEN || strlen(to) > ICONV_CSNMAXLEN)
62 return EINVAL;
63 din.ia_version = ICONV_ADD_VER;
64 strcpy(din.ia_converter, "xlat");
65 strcpy(din.ia_from, from);
66 strcpy(din.ia_to, to);
67 din.ia_data = table;
68 din.ia_datalen = 256;
69 olen = sizeof(dout);
70#ifdef APPLE
71 seteuid(eff_uid); /* restore setuid root briefly */
72 if (sysctlbyname("net.smb.fs.iconv.add", &dout, &olen, &din, sizeof(din)) == -1) {
73 seteuid(real_uid); /* and back to real user */
74 return errno;
75 }
76 seteuid(real_uid); /* and back to real user */
77#else
78 if (sysctlbyname("kern.iconv.add", &dout, &olen, &din, sizeof(din)) == -1)
79 return errno;
80#endif
81 return 0;
82#endif
83}
84
